page.title: 17 Education of the deaf.
page.content: } Three types of deafness are:- Born deaf,Deafness through loud noise and Hard of hearing.The deaf community in this area are mainly hard of hearing, as there are many old people. There are facilities for deaf children at St. Osmunds,so they can be with normal children and socialize with them. Special teachers visit the deaf and talk in hand language (for deaf and blind),and sign language (for just deaf). The 62 club in Dorchester, get together with deaf youths. There is a lip-reading centre in Dorchester where there are professional teachers. Most people in this area who want to go to residential centres go to Exeter.In Weymouth there is social centre for the adult deaf.
